name: 神村浩也
awards: 2024年 第49届多伦多国际电影节 站台奖 (提名) 束草的冬天
2024年 第72届圣塞巴斯蒂安国际电影节 最佳新导演 (提名) 束草的冬天
introduction: Koya Kamura（神村幸哉）是一位出生于巴黎的法日双籍导演。他毕业于原巴黎第七大学（Paris VII）电影专业，后赴东京庆应义塾大学（Keio University）深造，2007年于法国维亚康姆集团（VIACOM Group，旗下含MTV、GameOne频道）开启职业生涯，2008年加入华特迪士尼公司（Walt Disney Company）担任创意监制及导演。Koya Kamura is a French-Japanese director born in Paris. Graduated from Film University at Paris VII before studying at Keio University in Tokyo, he began his career in France at VIACOM group (MTV, GameOne) in 2007 and later joined the Walt Disney Company in 2008 as a Creative Producer and Director.截至2020年，Koya仍任职于迪士尼，参与开发Disney+平台首批原创剧本内容。自2010年起，他在迪士尼工作期间同时为多个制作公司及品牌担任导演与艺术总监，合作对象包括阿迪达斯（Adidas）、红牛（Red Bull）、欧莱雅（L’Oréal）、诺基亚（Nokia）、雪铁龙（Citroën）和百龄坛（Ballantines）。Still in the company in 2020, Koya worked on the development of the first Disney+ scripted contents. Since 2010, alongside his tenure at Disney, he has directed and served as Artistic Director for various production companies and brands including Adidas, Redbull, L’Oréal, Nokia, Citroën, and Ballantines.2019年，Koya Kamura推出首部剧情短片《望乡》（Homesick），该片以福岛禁区（Fukushima No-go-zone）为背景，在多个国际电影节斩获奖项与好评，并于2021年入围法国凯撒电影奖（César Awards）。2023年，他执导的首部长片作品《束草的冬天》（Winter in Sokcho，入围2024年多伦多国际电影节（TIFF）及圣塞巴斯蒂安国际电影节（SSIFF））在韩国拍摄完成，由法国一线演员罗什迪·泽姆（Roschdy Zem）与贝拉·金（Bella Kim）主演。Koya Kamura's fictional directorial debut came with his short film Homesick in 2019, set in the Fukushima No-go-zone, which garnered acclaim and awards at major international film festivals, including a selection for the French Academy Awards César in 2021.In 2023, Koya directed his first feature film, Winter in Sokcho (Toronto TIFF and San Sebastiàn SSIFF 2024), starring French A-list actor Roschdy Zem and Bella Kim, filmed in Korea.目前，Koya Kamura正在筹备第二部长片《蒸发者》（Évaporés，暂译），这是一部以福岛为背景的黑色电影（film noir），项目处于开发阶段。Koya Kamura is currently in development on his second feature film, Évaporés, a dark film noir set in Fukushima.来源KOYA KAMURA个人网站
